rooms.description: Garage for two vehicles with accessible design and ample storage space.
Servant's quarters designed for privacy and functional living, wheelchair accessible.
Open-plan living area combining dining, kitchen and lounge space with Bohemian decor and ample natural light from large windows.
Bohemian styled kitchen equipped with modern appliances and natural stone finishes, designed for functionality and accessibility.

openings.description: Accessible entrance door leading to the living area, with a ramp where needed.
Motorized garage door facilitating vehicle access and security.
Large, energy-efficient windows in the living area for natural light and ventilation, designed according to Vastu guidelines.
